mapper.sql: SELECT rent_no, car_no, user_id, rent_status, booking_date, start_date, end_date, reserv_pax, add_option, delete_status, merchant_uid , (SELECT user_nick FROM usertb U WHERE U.user_id = R.user_id ) AS guestnick , (SELECT user_id FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no ) AS hostid , (SELECT car_name FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no ) AS carname , (SELECT loc_name_ko FROM location_category L WHERE L.loc_cate = (SELECT location FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as location , (SELECT area_name_ko FROM area_category A WHERE A.area_cate = (SELECT area FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no) AND A.loc_cate = (SELECT location FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as area , (SELECT user_nick FROM usertb U WHERE U.user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as hostnick FROM renttb R
